amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute for the Brownback amendment, to restrict U.S. intelligence information sharing unless the President certifies to Congress that procedures have been established for protecting unauthorized disclosure. The amendment would waive the certification requirement under circumstances in which U.S. troops were participating in a U.N. action, or when there was an eminent threat to the lives of U.S. citizens.

action.text: Substitute (A010) offered by Mr. Combest to the Brownback amendment (A009).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Combest amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
